data.name: 垃圾游戏
data.detailed_description: In the game, you will control a small person, in a thousand square house, get the key, get out. Open doors, parkour, puzzles, passwords, these are your escape tools. To find a way forward through repeated loss and failure. You can fight bugs, get stuck, and find features that aren't perfect. But it doesn't matter, your brain goes through it. But when you go through it, you find that your brain is worse
data.about_the_game: In the game, you will control a small person, in a thousand square house, get the key, get out. Open doors, parkour, puzzles, passwords, these are your escape tools. To find a way forward through repeated loss and failure. You can fight bugs, get stuck, and find features that aren't perfect. But it doesn't matter, your brain goes through it. But when you go through it, you find that your brain is worse
data.short_description: This is a game that can't be called a game. You buy it except occupy your computer's memory, waste your time and waste your money. I myself will not buy, who buys who big injustice kind, he is similar to the chamber of Secrets escape, the goal is to escape out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i5-1155G7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NO
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i5-1155G7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NO
